snippet: Apple’s stock dropped after reports emerged that the company had cut orders for parts for the iPhone 5 because of weak demand.
abstract: Stocks fall as worries over demand for Apple products drives down its shares and investors brace for earnings disappointments.
lead_paragraph: Apple’s stock dropped after reports emerged that the company had cut orders for parts for the iPhone 5 because of weak demand.

headline.seo: Apple Stocks Weigh Down Nasdaq and S.&P.
headline.main: Concerns About Apple Weigh on S.&P. and Nasdaq
headline.print_headline: Concerns About Apple Weigh on S.&P. and Nasdaq
